name: Food Chain (itch) (Colly2000)
description:
How to play: 

Leave your den and follow the path to get to the food. 

Be careful though! A wolf lurks around the forest. Step

on a twig and the wolf will find you. Use the blue rabbit 

holes to make a speedy escape. 

If you make it to the food, grab a carrot and begin your

careful journey back home.

How To Move:

W: Forward 

A: Left

S: Back

D: Right

Hold the Shift key to run

Use the mouse to look around your surroundings

Feedback Form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdjk6TKdCW7m9yhjiwGye8Bv9dB7rcFxi-0bGIB...
